Matching Dropdown Activity

Age Range Developmental Milestone
6 Months Responds to sounds by making sounds, babbles vowels
12 Months Pulls up to stand, gets to sitting without help, may stand alone
18 Months Follows one step commands, points to own body parts, scribbles on his own
2 Years Responds to sounds by making sounds, babbles vowels
3 Years Takes turns in games, shows concern for others crying, dresses & undresses
4-6 Years Can typically hop, skip, jump, & dance, copies shapes and letters
7-9 Years Starts narrowing to a few friends, easily influenced by their peers
10-12 Years Able to think about abstract ideas
